  1. City Council Seeks Volunteers to Serve on Boards & Commissions

    The City Council encourages all citizens to consider becoming involved in city government by serving on a city board or commission. Read More

  2. May 4, 2019 - SPECIAL ELECTION

    A Special Election has been called for May 4, 2019, to consider renovation, repair and other improvements of the City’s Love Civic Center as a venue project and approving an increase in the hotel occupancy tax. Read on...

    A Community Event hosted by City of Paris Saturday May 11, 2019, 10:00AM - 2:30PM at Cox Field Airport. Read on...
